Posts.Content: Mar 9, 2009 01:57AM chekwa wrote: Thanks leaf.. I needed that. I was just afraid because I had 2 grandmas & 2 cousins on my father's side who had breast cancer. One of my cousins told me that it can sometimes be hereditary.
Posts.Title: worried with these symptoms.. chekwa LynnW

Posts.Content: Mar 10, 2009 10:14AM chekwa wrote: Thank you all for the support... it's really nerve racking... and the stinging pain in my breast is getting more painful everyday. I will have my ultrasound tomorrow and I will see my doctor the next day so I will let you all know of the results. About the gene tests, I really don't have any idea about it and I haven't asked my relatives, who were cancer survivors, what kind cancer they had before. I will keep you all updated... hope it's benign again just like the cyst that was taken from me before. To BJ09... we will get through with this.... just pray.... that's what keeps me strong right now.. HUGS TO ALL!!!
Posts.Title: worried with these symptoms.. chekwa LynnW

Posts.Content: Mar 14, 2009 09:21AM chekwa wrote: hi everybody... i just had my ultrasound done last wednesday but they found nothing so they recommended me for mammo ... i thought everything was ok but when i had my mammo last thursday and got the result the next day, i was surprised. i was complaining about the pain and discharge i am having on my right breast but i didn't expect that they didn't see any lumps on my right breast. instead, they saw one on my left breast and it seems like it's not a ball of mass coz it looks kinds\a abstract in shape and has a little hole on it when they let me check the film. the doctor told me that they have to repeat the mammo on monday for a spot magnification... i was hoping and praying that it will only be a benign mass once again... thank you all for your support... HUGS to all!
Posts.Title: worried with these symptoms.. chekwa LynnW

Posts.Content: chekwa wrote: Hi... i am new here. i am 29 years old, married and with 3 kids. when i took a bath the other day, i felt 3 lumps on my right breast. there was also a stinging pain and there was a white sticky discharge in my right breast. i also have painful lymph nodes at the back of my neck... when i was in college, i had breast incision due to a benign cyst with a size of a big strawberry and now i have it again and i dont know if it's benign this time. i dont think these symptoms are normal so i want to ask you if you're experiencing the same symptoms as mine. i will undergo mammography this coming wednesday and im really afraid of the result. pls help... thanks.
